data.title: Fribourg → Paris Gare de Lyon by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Fribourg to Paris Gare de Lyon in 4h 38m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Fribourg to Paris Gare de Lyon today.
data.text:
Looking to travel from Fribourg to Paris Gare de Lyon by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 7 hours 22 minutes to travel from Fribourg to Paris Gare de Lyon by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 4 hours 38 minutes though. You'll usually find 30 trains per day running along the 263 miles (423 km) route between these two destinations. You’ll need to make 1 change during the journey to Paris Gare de Lyon, as there currently aren't any direct services on this route.

Plan your trip ahead and book your train tickets in advance if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Just start a search in our Journey Planner to view the latest prices for trains from Fribourg to Paris Gare de Lyon.

If you’re feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Paris Gare de Lyon by train, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times.
